channel.title: ssh on Roomy
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on Roomy

item.title: When we connect ssh with .pem
item.description: We sometimes need to connect to computer in other network. It is necessary the key like pem(Private Enhanced Mail) When we connect. I will just write the flow about it. flow Generate .pem key (I am using AWS). Change mode of .pem file to 400 to read it. Identify file and connect to ssh (AWS linux for me). DONE Change permission of file I will change mode of key file and connect to ssh with it.
